description: Missed a few palm mutes that were missing.  My bad.
title: Light Bearer

description: The last guy had the right idea on some parts, but he got others wrong.  I'm impressed that he found some things that were mistakes on my part, and that he took the time to fix them himself, though he probably should have looked at some more live videos and used transcribe! (the software literally has an exclaimation point) as references.  This new file fixes the mistakes and adds the new correct ones.  I'll be adding this to my guitar pro file on Ultimate-Guitar as well.
title: Light Bearer

description: fixed some mistakes that stuck out like a sore thumb.
title: Light Bearer

description: fixed some notes to be tremolo since the tremolo button on Guitar Pro doesn't transfer over on Songsterr.
title: Light Bearer

description: Added missing tracks, and adjusted some notes based off carefully watching a live video on YouTube.
title: Light Bearer
